summary: Better skyrim intro that I made that replaces the flashing betheseda logo at the start with some scenery
descriptionHtml:
Hello all, thanks for viewing/downloading!

Here is a quick intro I made thats a couple of seconds long, I just learned a lot of 

tools about video editing today, and did this little mod after studying for several hours 

for my exam. It felt weird playing an RPG that didnt have its name orientated somewhere 

on the main menu or introduction, so I threw this little video file together. It may be 

improved VASTLY if more people like it as well!

installation:

Simply extract this folder to your skyrim folder (usually located in C:\\Program Files 

(x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\)

If you get a prompt to overwrite the EXISTING Betheseda game logo introduction (the 

flashing name), select yes. I have included a backup named original just in case you do 

not fancy my introduction.

Anyways, enjoy =)
author: sval
